title: Hopeless
description: Hopeless - :1. A common state of mind when the world has ended, your best friend's betrayed you, or you have nothing left to live for, nor do you even know if you're alive any longer.2. Something Sadie refuses to feel.(A Cerys du Lys zombie erotic romance novella)Evan and Sadie thought nothing could go wrong. The world was already ruined. All they wanted was a reprieve, a chance at a regular life. Nothing ever goes as planned, though.After Evan's best friend betrays him and his survivor group leader locks Sadie in a cage fit for animals, he's destroyed. His desires, passion, hope and dreams; all snuffed in an instant. There's nothing he can do. This world despises optimists.Sadie, trapped. When Evan's leader sends men to take her away, she's lost. Her need to be normal, the absolute driving force carrying her on, her growing love for a man who admires all her flaws; nothing has meaning. Was it wrong to trust in the goodness of others?The world is a hard place and it's becoming harder, but it doesn't need to be that way. Everyone makes mistakes, but they can change and grow and yearn for more. The rain will stop. Nothing is ever Hopeless. Sometimes it just takes awhile to realize it.
author: Cerys du Lys
